text.name: theme_info
text.text:
Welcome to Nomado-DX!
The priority of this theme was focused on fluidity but also readability on small screens. If you spot a bug or anything else please open an issue directly on my github :
→ https://github.com/Snapouille/Nomado-DX ←
You can also contact me on the Batocera, Retrobat or Knulli discords.
To remove this information window I invite you to do START, Display settings, Theme configuration, Theme information and change the value to ‘Hide’.
I hope you enjoy (ツ)
Snapouille
